0111001011101101 1100001001001011 0 -> sum: 0011010100111000, cout: 1

1100000111110100 0101001001000000 1 -> sum: 0001010000110101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
